entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Segmentation fault when binary is located in certain path - snap installation in Ubuntu #96425
  • WASI Developer Experience Goals #96419
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `JsonObject` constructor that accepts a known-length `IReadOnlyCollection` to avoid unnecessary array resize operations #96417
  • Unexpected result from evaluated method #96416
  • `AVX512F.Compare()` not accelerated on xarch #96414
  • investigate outliers in Rebar regex benchmarks #96413
  • Assembly.LoadFrom overload unconditionally throws NotSupportedException #96410
  • Test failure: ComInterfaceGenerator.Tests #96409
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer constructor serialization does not ignore readonly properties #96408
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async_HttpMessageInvoker Test failure #96407
  • Inconsistent behavior with JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull in .NET 8 #96404
  • NRE in `iOS.Device.Aot.Test` when starting up xharness #96403
  • [NativeAOT] Doesn't add methods to export-table via UnmanagedCallersOnly #96401
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization allows different hashes for strings that return `true` for `Equals` #96400
  • Exception when cloning and modifying current process access token #96397
  • [API Proposal]: Let MemoryPool<T>.Shared.Rent support clear the data when return #96396
  • Opt-out switch for disabled OCSP Stapling by default #96395
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Exceptions/UnwindFpBleedTest/UnwindFpBleedTest/UnwindFpBleedTest.cmd #96391
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_370233/DevDiv_370233/DevDiv_370233.cmd #96390
    9.0.0
  • Add implementations for SignatureHelper.AddSentinel() and/or other methods in mono runtime #96389

Closed

  • Jose.JoseException: Unable to sign content #94959
    9.0.0
  • Calling `MoveNext` on a readonly `List<int>.Enumerator` field does nothing #96424
  • [API Proposal]: Allow setting explicit packing for 32 bit platforms only. #95802
  • .Net 7/8 failed to fork process at Linux #95890
  • Make Type.IsPrimitive a JIT intrinsic (and JIT time constant) #95929
    9.0.0
  • [R2R] Drop inlining observations when inlining is not performed #95815
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Globalization.Tests.CultureInfoAll.TestAllCultures_Nls #96302
  • TimeZoneInfo.IsInvalidTime(DateTime) returns false for times which don't exist in Samoa Standard Time #96269
  • NaN arithmetic is not consistent with the IEEE 754 standard. #96246
  • System.Net.Http.StreamContent.ReadAsStreamAsync() doesn't reset to stream to initial position #95344
    9.0.0
  • Update `Regex` use of `SearchValues<string>` to be `OrdinalCaseInsensitive` #91645
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient: Deadlock in `SendAsync` when `AllowDuplex` is true under specific conditions #96223
  • [browser][hybridGlobalization] WBT: Hybrid Globalization fails with AOT #94212
  • SpanHelpers.ClearWithoutReferences has several invalid (unaligned) casts #26654
    Future
  • [Code cleanup] We have many macros named ETW* that are not specific to ETW #12913
    Future
  • ProgressMessageHandler fires too often and cannot be configured #95897
  • DOTNET_EnableDiagnostics=0 disables profiling in .NET 8 #96227
    Future
  • Test failure Attempt #1 - System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicConnectionTests.TestConnect(address: ::1) #95776
  • Unable to get Entire Certificate Chain in SSL Communication when creating a c++ Socket client using openSSL. #95578

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix JitInfo tests with ReadyToRun #96423
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update branding to 8.0.2 #96422
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.16 #96421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.27 #96420
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • update snapcraft.yaml for jan releases #96418
    needs-area-label
  • Revert "Manually optimize a rem 64 instruction to avoid regression on runtimes which do not currently optimize it (#96203)" #96415
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: Set false target for predecessor to first cold block #96412
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix unhandled exception from foreign thread in new EH #96411
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Disable QUIC tests on CLR stress tests #96392
    area-System.Net.Quic

Merged

  • macOS: Set certificate as a dependency of private key handles #95924
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Explicitly set `bbFalseTarget` in `BasicBlock::SetCond` #96406
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove null check in BasicBlock::SetNext and SetPrev #96228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsPrimitive #96226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve branch optimizer around implied relops #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Disable System.Globalization.Tests on aot/windows #96405
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Don't rely on inlining observations if VM doesn't allow that #96373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Use `SearchValues<string>` for prefix searching in RegexCompiler / source generator #96402
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve the hash function used in the `InstMethodHashTable` #95285
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Build fixes for Bionic on x64 #95382
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: fix issue with out of order importer spilling around some calls #95587
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • Implement remaining ILGenertorImpl methods, excluding scope. Add max stack calculation for branching. #96362
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #95721
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Clean up the thread local memory regardless of managed thread's presence #95722
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] [NativeAOT/Apple] Map the thunks using vm_allocate/vm_remap #95964
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change Native AOT ThreadBuffer.m_threadId to OS thread id #96120
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.129, windows: 120.0.6099.130 #96376
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove ActiveIssue for passing tests #96393
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95302
    Servicing-approved, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Avoid handing out duplicate `CORINFO_MODULE_STRUCT_*` handles #95499
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • ReadAsStream/CopyTo should reset result/destination stream position #95827
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Tweak new API template #96217
    area-Meta
  • Replaced string concatenation by StringBuilder usage #95760
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix potential NREs in ConfigurationBindingGenerator #96078
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator
  • Fix comments of Min/MaxMagnitude{Number} #95495
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Clarify OS and Arch ownership #95972
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Skip address for x64 prefix parsing #96375
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Update coredistools #96286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid copy action for root assemblies #96363
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Rework the special instantiation type logic to be more effective #95490
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow specifying IndentCharacter and IndentSize when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Timespan int overloads #95779
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean up illink suppressions #96361
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update MicrosoftNETCoreCoreDisToolsVersion to 1.3.0 #96291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #96319
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Experiment: Minopts lsra #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Explicit zeroing for stackalloc if inlined into a caller without LocalsInit #96220
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Enable activation injection for unix #95555
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix performance of System.Security. Cryptography.Tests #95310
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Limit `PNSE` by using Invariant `SortKey` in `HybridGlobalization` #96354
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • HashSet.UnionWith preformance improvement #92300
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #94582
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated #95733
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #96055
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #96053
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #96388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #95807
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix idle HTTP/2 connection KeepAliveTimeout teardown #96158
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • UInt64.CreateSaturating<Int128> truncates instead of saturates #96369
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono] Do not throw in AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata. #96370
    community-contribution, area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [Mono][WIP]Enable runtime tests on android arm64 #89114
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add osx RPATH in corehost #96367
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • [HybridGlobalization] Fix xamarin_macios build after system ICU change #96270
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [Mono][RISC-V] Lowering and output more OP for Regression test #96368
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow preinitializing `AppContext.TryGetSwitch` #95948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add "Who built this" to `dotnet --info` #37725
  • Error NU1301: `dotnet tool install` #37714
  • `dotnet` should report .NET not MSBuild version #37713
  • `UseMSBuildTestInfrastructure` doesn't work for multi-tfm #37712
  • [BUG] 'To build this project, the following workloads must be installed: maui-android', but the workload is already installed #37706

Closed

  • dotnet build always throwing error #17411
    Discussion
  • maybe just leave it as is as it's fine on 12. The only reason we moved some to 13 is that there wasn't enough infrastructure on branding day to support all branches on 12. #37698
  • `dotnet restore` does not support `-f TFM` #35408
  • dotnet tools not working in linux #37703
  • NativeAOT: Allow *completely static* executables to be built on Linux (Alpine) #37643

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.102 #37724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.406 #37723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.313 #37722
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.116 #37721
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.419 #37720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.322 #37719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.127 #37718
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dotnet-format to the SDK repo #37717
    Area-Format
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37715
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Dedup version for workload version subcommand Fixes #35920 #36085
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2343499 #37680
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Provide new default for runtime identifier Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add option to "collapse declaration level within #regions when collapsing to definitions" #71450
  • XML doc comments need to respect accessibility limitations for referenced assemblies #71442
  • [API Proposal]:Attribute to execute the method at compile time #71438
  • C# Interactive does not use .NET Core 8 SDK in Visual Studio 2022 #71434
    Backlog

Closed

  • cref's to public members become ambiguous when an internal member is also in scope #4033
    Backlog
  • Elide MemoryMarshal.ToEnumerable when spread in a collection expression #71223
  • MacOS Rolling builds crashing in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.UnitTests #71241
  • Warn about possibly unintended behavior in `x is not A or B` pattern matching expressions #71204
  • Request for Clarification: What is the behavior of relative paths for the purposes of a #line directive? #71202
  • NU1608: Detected package version outside of dependency constraint #71146
  • Trying to download preview version of packages from MS public NuGet feed is returning ERROR 403: Time-Limited URL validation failed #71448
  • Restore is broken locally in main #71447
  • Poor codegen for collection expression spread (ROS<T> -> ImmutableArray<T>) #71292
  • IDE0057 Fires for slice-like method calls where substitution to range operator is not valid #71435
  • Roslyn cannot interpret some kinds of assembly written in IL #33841
    Backlog
  • Option for IDE0305 to ignore ToList and similar calls that would result in [.., expr] format #71439
  • Primary constructor parameter not listed among completions, if base class has the same parameter #71440

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: update conversion tests for overload resolution failure #71452
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Snap main into 17.9 #71446
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Snap for 17.9 P3 #71445
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade BCL assembly to 8.0.0 #71444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve parsing performance with large collection expressions of numbers #71443
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Add razor diagnostic endpoint #71365
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: tests for spreads of dynamic and non-generic IEnumerable collections #71158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Standardize use of prepareMachine for ci cleanup #71265
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce scope of banned API suppressions to only what is necessary #70303
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pass project info to the Razor extension in VS Code #70913
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • PR feedback and cleanup after solution-state/compilation-state refactoring. #71389
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Params Collections: misc chanages #71423
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Params Collections - Adjust binding in presence of dynamic arguments #71421
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Lazily calculate preview operations #68214
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Detect ambiguous MVC route on [HttpGet("")] vs [HttpGet] #53102
  • NotAuthroized Does Not Work With Windows Authentication Blazor 8 #53100
  • FormFeature initialized with an IFormCollection instance throws NullReferenceException in Form property getter #53099
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53094
  • Perf regression: caching #53093
  • MultipartFormDataContent with CancellationToken Error #53092
  • [Infrastructure] get-version fails on our CI because node is not installed by the CI pipeline. #53091
  • Perf improvement: single_query #53085

Closed

  • Enable MVC Views/Pages to invoke a Component as a TAG #6348
    Backlog
  • Issue with multiple EditForm on the same page #53019
  • StaticWebAssets.Publish.targets -The process cannot access the file o net8.0-android #52460
    8.0.1
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer 7.0.10 results in Unbounded Breakpoints for swa cli #50740
    7.0.x
  • [Blazor] Drag and Drop css file in .NET 8 project #53090
  • HTTP Error 500.0 - Internal Server Error for System.dll and MudBlazor.dll #52994

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK version #53101
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 8.0.2 #53098
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 7.0.16 #53097
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.27 #53096
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [Blazor] Switch to rollup for bundling #53095
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [Infrastructure] Removes npx usage and updates dependencies #53089
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add explicit null checks on ObjectPool.Return rather than triggering random failures later on #52935
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread (Net9) #52724
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 8 Planning
  • [release/8.0] Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52943
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Use an image w/ node for SourceBuild #52969
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #52908
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A wait cursor is shown when a Maui application has been loaded in Windows #19661
  • Unable to request android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS #19658
    .NET 8 SR2
  • CarouselView - Content disappears when 'Loop' is false and inside ScrollView #19657
  • ImageCache to clean dictionary instead of keeping semaphores permanently in memory #19656
  • Decimal point on numeric keyboard not working since Net8.0 #19655
  • Wrong CursorPosition in Entry Handler #19654
  • Entry with Handler ignores Placeholder text #19651
  • [X] Simplify XamlServiceProvider setup code generated by XamlC when invoking markup extensions #19650
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error #19649
  • [X] Avoid calling ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource from code generated by XamlC #19648
  • [X] Consider producing build errors when XAML compilation is bypassed and XAML parsing at runtime is disabled #19647
  • Calculation of y-position of element to find out if something is on screen does not work as expected #19646
  • Could not find Android Resource.. #19645

Closed

  • newwebsite #19635
  • Deploy from windows visual studio to Apple device appicon and splashscreen problem #19640
  • How does MAUI release cycle look like? #19644
  • [Testing] SetSemantic tests fails on iOS 17 #19122
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Splash Screen Issue on Tablets in both portrait and landscape modes #17887

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix Tabbar Visibility Tests #19662
  • Add ReceiveSms permission if it's declared in manifest #19660
  • Added optional ReceiveSms permission #19659
    community ✨
  • [ci] Don't skip default provision on iOS #19652
    area/testing, testing-green-ci

Merged

  • Attach And Run iOS / catalyst semantic tests #19571

Updated

  • [Hosting] Register ImageSource services as KeyedServices #19641
    community ✨
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area/testing
  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Renaming TemporalTable PeriodStart/PeriodEnd maps to incorrect value #32705
  • IndexOutOfRange for EntityEntry.GetDatabaseValues() with complex type and TPH #32701
  • DbContextPoolingTest.Concurrency_test fails consistently on my machine #32700
  • Exception when using FromSql on entity with ComplexProperty #32699
  • Optimize ParameterExtractingExpressionVisitor #32698

Closed

  • .Contains(.First) Query Throws InvalidOperationException in EF Core 8 #32691
  • ValuesExpression does not implement proper table cloning logic #32664
  • Make our SelectExpression cloning mechanism compatible with external roots #30982
    9.0.0
  • Issue with circular navigation properties when using SqlServer #32681

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.2 #32704
  • Update branding to 7.0.16 #32703
  • Update branding to 6.0.27 #32702

Merged

  • Clean up and open table cloning logic #32665

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Preserve unicodeness and fixed-lengthiness in compiled model. #32683
    Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • Build Linux musl releases with -static-libgcc and -static-libstdc++ #18055
  • Add verbose option to build.sh (to apply to all parts of the dotnet-sdk src (ie fsharp,runtime,etc)) #18054
